src:
Bennacer Sesali Kekalahan AC Milan dari Lazio
07 Nov 2019, 21:52 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gelandang AC Milan Ismael Bennacer mengaku menyesali kekalahan Rossonneri dari Lazio pada awal pekan ini.
Sebelum melawan Lazio, Milan berhasil menang atas SPAL. Rossoneri menang 1-0 di laga yang dihelat di San Siro tersebut.
Di pekan berikutnya, Milan berusaha untuk meraih hasil yang sama melawan Lazio. Apalagi pertandingan itu juga dihelat di San Siro.
Akan tetapi pada akhirnya Milan malah kalah 1-2 dari Lazio. Rossoneri sempat menahan sang tamu 1-1 hingga menit ke-82.
text:
Bennacer Regrets AC Milan's defeat of Lazio
Nov 7 2019, 21:52 by Bola.net
AC Milan midfielder Ismael Bennacer admitted he regretted Rossonneri's defeat to Lazio earlier this week.
Before against Lazio, Milan managed to win over SPAL. The Rossoneri won 1-0 in the match held at the San Siro.
In the following week, Milan tried to achieve the same result against Lazio. Moreover, the match was also held at the San Siro.
But in the end Milan even lost 1-2 to Lazio. Rossoneri had to hold the guest 1-1 until the 82nd minute.
